howtoplay_p1: You collect 'wasted time' by starting the timer and waiting.
howtoplay_p2: Clicking on 'reset' will save your 'wasted time'.
howtoplay_p3: In the shop, you can convert 'wasted time' into coins.
howtoplay_p4: You can use these coins to buy items.
howtoplay_p5: These items will then be displayed in your inventory on the main page.
shop_converter_headline: Turn your wasted time into coins
shop_converter_p: Description: 15 seconds of wasted time earns you 5 coins
shop_item1_p: Description: Time passes twice as fast (runs for 1 minute)
shop_item2_p: Description: gives 1 coin every 2 minutes (works for 10 minutes)
